hero.title: Participant points — tamper-proof on the blockchain
hero.subtitle: From October 2025, students receive VPP points as NFTs for participating in studies and surveys. Transparent, verifiable, paperless.
hero.gsnHint: Gasless via OpenGSN — no MATIC required.

participate.title: Participate → receive
participate.text: After completing a study you receive your VPP-NFT directly in your wallet.

prove.title: Prove → manage
prove.text: Your points are visible as NFTs. Course requirements are easy to verify.

secure.title: Secure → auditable
secure.text: Duplicate claims are prevented on-chain. Everything stays transparent and tamper-proof.

gas.title: Do I need to pay fees?
gas.content: No. Transactions are sponsored by our Paymaster (OpenGSN).

duplicate.title: Can I claim multiple times for the same study?
duplicate.content: No. The smart contract blocks duplicate claims and stores already granted combinations.

network.title: Which network is used?
network.content: Polygon Mainnet. When connected, the app will guide you to switch automatically.

privacy.title: Which data is stored?
privacy.content: On-chain NFT ownership only. We do not manage personal data.
